## Motivation 
Project goal: Investigate rodent complaints, inspections, and exterminator activities to find out trends and effectiveness of interventions.

Motivation: Address public health and sanitation concerns by understanding how city responses correlate with rodent complaints.

## Links to other websites
The data being used for this project is downloaded from [NYC Open data](https://data.cityofnewyork.us/Health/Rodent-Inspection/p937-wjvj/about_data)
